title: 谁知道sponge社区里的Ore分类是什么？
author: 5igm1
txt_content: 谁知道sponge社区里的Ore分类是什么？好久没上sponge社区了，突然发现多了一个Ore分类，下边还一堆插件。求问这是什么东西？找了一圈，没发现介绍。

replies.author: Lss233
replies.txt_content:
我一找就找到了
Welcome to the Ore Category!

Here, you will find threads that are synced to projects residing on Ore, the official Sponge Plugin and Mod Repository.

Topics cannot be created directly, but instead are created when submitting a new Plugin to the Ore repository.

Please note that until official release, some topics may be deleted as Ore is reset for new testing.就是一个发布插件的地方https://forums.spongepowered.org/t/about-the-ore-category/12485

replies.author: [EGG]
replies.txt_content:
楼上解答了问题？噢好吧
此问题已解答
